Package com.opengamma.strata.pricer.credit

Enum AccrualOnDefaultFormula

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<AccrualOnDefaultFormula>
      • com.opengamma.strata.pricer.credit.AccrualOnDefaultFormula
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Named, NamedEnum, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<AccrualOnDefaultFormula>
    public enum AccrualOnDefaultFormula
extends java.lang.Enum<AccrualOnDefaultFormula>
implements NamedEnum
    The formula for accrual on default.

    This specifies which formula is used in IsdaCdsProductPricer for computing the accrued payment on default. The formula is 'original ISDA', 'Markit fix' or 'correct'.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant Description
      CORRECT
      The mathematically correct formula.
      MARKIT_FIX
      The correction proposed by Markit (v 1.8.2).
      ORIGINAL_ISDA
      The formula in v1.8.1 and below.
